name: Clumsy Cookie Traffic Heads: Uber Tap-It-Up Racer Game Free
name_original: Clumsy Cookie Traffic Heads: Uber Tap-It-Up Racer Game Free
description:
Clumsy Cookie Traffic Heads : Uber Tap-It-Up Racer Game - delicious food fun. Once you play this your mouth will be watering :) Tap on the traffic colored cookie heads as fast as possible and get the highest score in 60 seconds. Simple and addictive game play fun. Go tap-it-up now!


FEATURES
- Easy single tap game play and uber fun.
- Beautiful and delicious food art work.
- World top score leader boards.
- Great for improving your reaction time in other games, become a ninja.
- Free to download


PLAYER REVIEWS
"very cool simple to play. just need 60 seconds to get the best score. i love the cookie pictures too" - bird tapper - Dec 2, 2013

"omg this is fun. so easy and im getting better at it now, reached 500 points :D im a cookie racer, lol" - angry ninja td - June 2, 2013


HOW TO PLAY
Tap the traffic colored cookie heads when they appear and get the best score in 1 minute. Tap on red cookies 1 time, yellow cookies 2 times, and green cookies 3 times. When an arrow cookie appears, tap the space next to the arrow. Don't tap any empty space or you will lose points.


Now go have a blast :)
The Panda Tap Mania Games team
